name: Circled (Draelent)
description:
Cover the targets with the right number of circles.

Finish all 8 levels with the least amount of circles, the perfect score is 24 (or even less ??)

CONTROLS: Click or Tap to grow a circle

nVn: Level design

Draelent: Developer & Artist

Beware! This game may seem easy, but becomes challenging very fast...

This game was made in less than 3 hours per person for Trijam #135.

Soon on mobile platform.
